name: Ayesha Rahman
persona: Ayesha is a hardworking third-year Mechanical Engineering student who consistently maintains a solid academic record. She is diligent and self-motivated, showing perseverance even when courses become challenging. While she occasionally feels anxious before exams, her strong sense of discipline and belief in her abilities help her push through. Ayesha aims to keep improving her grades and is committed to reaching her long-term goals in engineering.
